text.text:
ü•áBukit Gombak Stadium is located beside Bukit Gombak MRT Station and next to the scenic Little Guilin Park.
ü•áThe Stadium was home ground to Gombak United in the S-League before they left in 2002.
ü•áIt was then converted to a Centre of Excellence for the Singapore Athletic Association.
‚öΩThe Stadium is mostly used for football matches.
ü´ÑResidents living nearby, both young and old are seen having their morning workout.
ü•áIt's great to see that the Stadium is well utilised.
üïüStadium opening hours:
Daily 4.30 am to 9.30 pm
Closed on PH
Main Gate opens at 7. 00 am
Side Gate opens at 4.30 am
üöªThere is Toilet with shower facilities
üöòAmple parking at Carpark behind MRT Station.

text.text: This stadium is a great spot for both running and playing football. Whenever I visit, it's clean and usually not too crowded, which is a bonus. Its proximity to a park adds to the ambiance, offering a pleasant view while you exercise. Plus, being near an MRT station makes it convenient to access.

text.text:
I m here so often since I move to Bukit Batok.
It‚Äôs a nice place for sports and exercise.
After the daily routine workout always follow by good food at nearby coffee shops .
It‚Äôs easy to park the car as HDB provides lots of parking facilities.

Like the clear blue sky and greenery of this natural park besideüòÅ the stadium.
It‚Äôs free for everyone so why not make full use of it daily ‚Ä¶.

text.text: Located just next to the Bukit Gombak mrt station so it is very convenient. The far end opposite the seating area is also a forested area so I guess it provides more fresh air.

originalText.text: Located just next to the Bukit Gombak mrt station so it is very convenient. The far end opposite the seating area is also a forested area so I guess it provides more fresh air.

text.text: Bukit gombak stadium is right beside the bukit gombak mrt Station which makes it easy to access. There are, badminton courts, gyms, water coolers, basketball hoops, running track, table tennis table and much more. If your looking for a drink you can go to the gombak mrt station to get a quick drink before exercising. And if you want to play badminton, make sure to bring covered shoes!
